title: Minecraft - DISC - NPUB31419
description:
Minecraft PS3 edition - DISC for ODE.
I used PKG2ISO method. How to?
1. Extract PKG
2. Add PS3_DISC.sfb from any other game
3. Resign eboot to disc
4. Change .sfo to disc based
5. Make ISO
6. Enjoy!
                   -Method by aldostools
How to play on ODE:
1. Make ISO with genps3iso
2. Copy into external hard / usb.
3. Open Cobra Manager / (E3 ODE)head to images, then press Triangle on E3OS1.23 then click Display all.
4. Click on the game.
5. Reboot (IF ON COBRA ODE, E3 ODE USERS, DONT REBOOT)
6. Play!
